Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_Template_Da.description: Sales Items that will use the Revenue Recognition Schedule Template
The number of installments to be generated by the Revenue Recognition Schedule
If true, the Revenue Recognition Schedule will generate installments until the specified date
If true, the Revenue Recognition Schedule will automatically generate installments after contract approval
Can only be true, if auto generate is true, then the installments will be automatically submitted for approval

validation.validation: Automatically Generate Installments must be True in order to mark Automatically Submit Schedule for Approval True

Revenue_Recognition_Schedule_Template_Da.description: Automatically Regenerate Installments flag.  Use this flag to automatically regenerate installments when Customer Contract Amendments are completed.

Automatically Submit Schedule via Contract Amendment flag. Use this flag to automatically submit the Revenue Recognition Schedule on Customer Contract Amendment completion after installments are automatically regenerated.
Independent Revenue Processing allows recognize revenue without depending on the Billing status of a billable transaction.
True if you want the revenue recognition schedule to generate cumulative catch-up installments when you modify the customer contract term or line amounts.

description: Element containing Revenue Recognition Schedule Template data

validation.validation: Only one of 'Number of Installments' or 'Use To Date on Contract' must be specified.
Either 'Number of Installments' must be specified, or 'Use To Date on Contract' must be selected.
If you select percent complete, you must enter a value in Percent Complete Method.
If you select Percent Complete Method, the distribution method must be Percent Complete.
If you select Independent Revenue Processing, the distribution method must be Transaction.
To generate cumulative catch-up installments, specify a schedule type enabled for revenue recognition and a revenue recognition method of Spread Even, Number of Days, or Defined Installment.
To automatically regenerate installments or submit the schedule via a contract amendment, specify a revenue recognition method of Spread Even, Number of Days, or Defined Installment.
To create a revenue recognition schedule template, specify a schedule type that's enabled for revenue recognition on the Maintain Schedule Types task.
To create or edit a revenue recognition schedule template with a multi-period revenue recognition schedule type, specify a revenue recognition method of Spread Even or Number of Days.
To enable Automatically Submit Schedule via Contract Amendment, you must also enable Automatically Regenerate Installments.
